heroData.title: Gokul Raj
heroData.subTitle: Hello, Iâ€™m
heroData.description: I'm a software developer with work experience in Mobile application. I have specialized in React Native, JavaScript, Node JS , MongoDB, Express JS and Figma design

aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Gokul Raj
aboutData.subtitle: Mobile Application Developer
aboutData.text: I have work experience as a software developer, specializing in mobile application development.My expertise lies in React Native, which allows me to create cross-platform mobile apps using JavaScript.I'm proficient in Node.js, using it for server-side development, and MongoDB for database management. I also have experience with Express.js, which is a popular Node.js web application framework. Additionally, I have skills in Figma, enabling me to design user interfaces and user experiences for mobile applications.This combination of skills allows me to work on end-to-end mobile app development, from design to backend development and front-end coding.

services.title: Mobile App Development (React Native)
services.text: Custom mobile app development for iOS and Android platforms.Cross-platform development to ensure broad market reach.Integration of native device features and APIs.

services.title: Backend Development (Node.js with Express)
services.text: Building scalable and robust server-side applications using Node.js and Express.API development and integration to support mobile app functionalities.Authentication and authorization implementation

services.title: Database Development and Management (MongoDB , PhpMyAdmin)
services.text: Design and implementation of MongoDB databases. Data modeling and optimization for better performance. Data migration and transformation services.

services.title: UI/UX Design (Figma)
services.text: User interface and experience design for mobile applications.Prototyping and wireframing to visualize app functionality.Design iteration based on user feedback and testing.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.text: End-to-end development services covering both frontend (React Native) and backend (Node.js with Express).Seamless integration of frontend and backend components for a cohesive user experience.

services.title: API Development and Integration
services.text: Design and development of RESTful APIs using Express.Integration of third-party APIs for additional functionalities.API documentation for client reference.

services.title: Authentication and Authorization
services.text: Implementation of secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms. Integration with OAuth, JWT, or other authentication protocols.

services.title: Deployment and Hosting
services.text: Deployment of mobile applications to app stores (Google Play Store, Apple App Store).Hosting and deployment of backend services on platforms like AWS, Heroku, or others.

services.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
services.text: Unit testing and integration testing for both frontend and backend components.Debugging and error resolution.Performance testing for optimal app functionality.

services.title: Maintenance and Support
services.text: Ongoing support and maintenance for both mobile apps and backend services.Regular updates to ensure compatibility with new OS versions and technology changes.Bug fixes and issue resolution.

services.title: Security Audits
services.text: Conducting security audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities in both frontend and backend components.Implementing security best practices to protect user data.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: I have work experience as a software developer, specializing in mobile application development.My expertise lies in React Native, which allows me to create cross-platform mobile apps using JavaScript.I'm proficient in Node.js, using it for server-side development, and MongoDB for database management. I also have experience with Express.js, which is a popular Node.js web application framework. Additionally, I have skills in Figma, enabling me to design user interfaces and user experiences for mobile applications.This combination of skills allows me to work on end-to-end mobile app development, from design to backend development and front-end coding.

experience.title: Mobile Application developer
experience.subTitle: Coimbatore,Tamil Nadu
experience.text: Experienced software developer specializing in React Native for cross-platform mobile app development using JavaScript. Proficient in Node.js for server-side development, MongoDB for database management, and Express.js for web applications. Skilled in Figma for designing seamless user interfaces and experiences. From concept to implementation, I excel in end-to-end mobile app development, covering design, backend, and front-end coding.

education.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
education.subTitle: AVS college of Arts and science - Periyar University
education.text: I successfully earned my Bachelor of Computer Science degree from AVS College of Arts and Science affiliated with Periyar University. Graduating in 2021, I achieved an impressive 85% with a first-class distinction, showcasing my commitment to academic excellence and a solid foundation in computer science. Throughout my studies, I gained valuable insights into various aspects of computer science, laying the groundwork for my successful career in software development.

education.title: HSC
education.subTitle: MPL Boys Hr Sec School - State Board
education.text: In the academic year 2017-2018, I completed my Higher Secondary Certificate at MPL Boys Higher Secondary School under the State Board. Demonstrating academic excellence, I secured a notable achievement by graduating with a first-class distinction, attaining an impressive 80%. This academic success laid the groundwork for my subsequent pursuit of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, where I continued to excel in my studies and build a strong foundation for my professional journey.

education.title: SSLC
education.subTitle: Shri Swamy Matric Hr Sec School - State Board
education.text: In 2016, I successfully completed my Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) at Shri Swamy Matric Higher Secondary School, accredited by the State Board. Demonstrating a commitment to academic excellence, I achieved a commendable 84%, showcasing a solid foundation in my early education. This academic milestone marked the beginning of my educational journey, setting the stage for subsequent achievements in higher studies and ultimately contributing to my success in the field of computer science and software development.
